text: Raymond M. Lloyd (born May 13, 1964) is an American professional wrestler, martial artist and actor. He is known for his time when he wrestled in World Championship Wrestling (WCW) during the late 1990s. He competed in WCW under the ring name Glacier. He currently wrestles on the independent circuit. Outside of professional wrestling, Lloyd has appeared in movies and television series. The first movie he appeared in was a low budget movie called Blood Bath, in 2002. In 2007, Lloyd guest starred in an episode of Burn Notice. In June 2024, Lloyd began working full time with All Elite Wrestling (AEW) as both a backstage producer and a trainer. ==Championships== *AWA World-1 South **AWA Southern Heavyweight Championship (one time) *Georgia All-Star Wrestling **GASW Tag Team Championship (one time, last) (with R.D.
